Name: :math:`nb_\text{SEC}`
Description: Number of seconds in one hour

Name: :math:`nb_\text{HOUR}^{t}`
Description: Number of hours for each time-step

Name: :math:`V_\text{MAX}^{b,~s}`
Description: Basins water volume upper boundary for each state

Name: :math:`V_\text{MIN}^{b,~s}`
Description: Basins water volume lower boundary for each state

Name: :math:`V_\text{DIS}^{t,~b}`
Description: Water volume entering a basin due to runoff and snowmelt

Name: :math:`F_\text{HYDRO}^{b,~h}`
Description: Factor to specify whether the water flowing through a hydro power plant is added into a basin or removed

Name: :math:`Q_\text{MAX}^{h,~s}`
Description: Max water that can flows through an  hydro power plant for each state

Name: :math:`\alpha^{h,~s}`
Description: Average factor for converting water flowing through a hydro power plant into power for each state (positive for turbines and negative for pumps).
